name: Carlyle St. Clair III
descriptions: Carlyle St. Clair III is a character living in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281.
Carlyle St. Clair III is the heir to an influential merchant house. St. Clair cut ties with his family and was completely ostracized for something he refuses to talk about.

With his originally well-off lifestyle and near complete seclusion, he was a natural choice after weeks of scouting as the main course for Mortimer's banquet at the Ultra-Luxe. However, when Mortimer's men attempted to capture Carlyle, they failed and he escaped. Since the attempt, he hasn't slept or barely left the area around his house, ever wary that another attempt to kidnap him might be made.

topics.response_text: Keep away from me, if you know what's good for you.

topics.topic_text: Your naked body, stud. Go into the dumpster and I'll meet you after I change.
topics.response_text: The dumpster? That's filthy!{surprised, not disgusted.}

topics.topic_text: You keep tilting your head to one side. Is your neck okay?
topics.response_text: It's been stiff lately. Since I was attacked I've been afraid to sleep in my bed. I know it's irrational.

topics.topic_text: I can get that out for you. <Apply Sleeper Hold>
topics.response_text: Oh that feels nice. I can already feel myself rela...{getting massaged, falling asleep mid-sentence as he says "relaxing"}

topics.topic_text: Try breathing deeply three times and then blowing on your thumb.
topics.response_text: Really? Is that some kind of ancient Chinese secret or something? Well, what the hell. I'll try anything once. Here goes...

topics.topic_text: Did you know there's a nerve in your neck that helps you sleep?
topics.response_text: Ouch! What the hell? I don't think that did any-{"Anything." He collapses mid-sentence.}

topics.topic_text: Look out, behind you! <Pistol Whip Carlyle>
You. You don't seem like you fit in here.
topics.response_text: That obvious, huh? Yeah I'm not from around here. But where I'm from, they don't want me, so that's just as well.

topics.topic_text: What's so bad about your reputation?
topics.response_text: Oh, sure. That's all I need. Someone telling people around here about my reputation. I'll be run out of here before dawn. Forget it.

topics.topic_text: Joining the White Glove Society could clear your name. They're respected.
topics.response_text: I've heard of them. Ultra-Luxe, right? Yeah, that'd be a step in the right direction. They'd never have me, though.

topics.topic_text: Talk to a man named Mortimer. He's looking for some big-name new members.
topics.response_text: Yeah? Okay, maybe I will. Hell, anything's better than this. Thanks.

topics.topic_text: Er... join the White Glove Society. They're cannibals, but that's probably a step up for you.
Maybe my weak and flimsy hands can massage that out for you.<Apply Sleeper Hold>
topics.response_text: What the-? Don't touch me. I could get a better massage from a baby.

topics.topic_text: Maybe beating your head on a rock will fix it.
Did you know there's a nerve on your neck that helps you sleep? It's... uh... I know it's here...
Look out, behind you! <Pistol Whip Carlyle>
topics.response_text: Huh? Hey, I think you dropped your gun there. Here. Here you go. Just don't point it at me, okay?
